page.title: 13GAMES AROUND BYFIELD
page.content: THE MOST POPULAR GAMES PEOPLE USED TO PLAY AND PLAY NOW ARE FOOTBALL, HOPSCOTCH AND TIG. TIG IS A GAME WHERE SOMEONE IS ON.THEY HAVE TO CATCH SOMEONE ELSE.THERE IS A LITTLE SIGN WHEN YOU DON'T WANT TO BE CAUGHT.YOU HAVE TO CROSS YOUR FINGERS AND SHOUT "NIGSESE".FIVE STONES IS A GAME THAT WASITE POPULAR .WE THROW FIVE STONES INTO THE AIR AND CATCH THEM ON THE BACK OF YOUR HAND.THIS GAME IS QUITE DIFFICULT.IT TAKES A LOT OF SKILL AND PRACTICE TO DO IT RIGHT.WE ASKED PARENTS IF THEY THOUGHT CHILDREN PLAY AS WELL AS THEY USED TO.MOST PEOPLE SAY THEY DO AND A COUPLE OF PEOPLE SAY THEY DON'T BECAUSE COMPUTERS AND TELEVISIONS ARE TAKING CONTROL OVER CHILDREN SO THEY DON'T MIX WITH OTHER CHILDREN SO MUCH.
